properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 6 at 11:02AM CST until February 10 at 11:00PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Buttahatchie River...Tombigbee
River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Tombigbee River at Bigbee
* until Monday February 10.
* At 10 AM Thursday the stage was 16.4 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring AND Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 17.4 feet on Friday February 07.
* Flood stage is 14.0 feet.
* The river rose above flood stage Wednesday February 05 and will
continue rising to near 17.4 feet by Friday February 07. The river
will fall below flood stage Monday February 10.
* At 17.0 feet...Water is flowing over portions of Hood Road and
extensive agricultural flooding is occurring.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued later today or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
